Detailed Description

This class is used to show histogram information.

Member Function Documentation

void HistogramConsole::activate ( bool  isReactivate  )  [virtual]

This method is called when the ConsoleManager activates this console.

The default behaviour is to no longer be the active console is this call is a reactivate.

Parameters:
isReactivate True if the console is currently active, otherwise false.

Reimplemented from XConsole.

bool HistogramConsole::allowDarkBackground (  )  const [virtual]

This method indicates if the current console allows the screen to be darkened before it is drawn.

Returns:
Returns true if background can be darknened.

Reimplemented from XConsole.

void HistogramConsole::update (  )  [protected, virtual]

This method overrides the XConsole method.

It is called to update this console.
